section.p: The structure is used to store microbiololgy findings that include organisms found, gram stain results, and organism growth status.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the microbiology finding. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: MBTESTCD, MBTEST. MBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

SHALL contain [1..3] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the microbiology finding. [SDTM: MBSEQ, MBREFID, MBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: MBMETHOD]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: MBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] value
The microbiology specimen result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: MBORRES, MBORRESU, MBSTRESC, MBSTRESN, MBSTRESU]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the specimen related test or measure is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] microbiologySpecimenFindingCategory with data type microbiology Specimen Finding Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the specimen related test or measure is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] microbiologySpecimenFindingSubCategory with data type microbiology Specimen Finding Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer
Used to record the organization performing the test.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Performer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not a result is considered a baseline value for the study.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Baseline Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Used to indicate whether or not a data value has derived frrom the results of other tests or inquiries.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)

Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the result of the specimen related test or measure is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] microbiologyResultCategory with data type microbiology Result Category
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain [1..3] id
A value that is provided to ensure the uniqueness of the microbiology finding. [SDTM: MBSEQ, MBREFID, MBSPID] A single identifier, the sequence number, is required.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A coded value that identifies the microbiology finding. The verbatim text is placed within the original text property of the CD data type. [SDTM: MBTESTCD, MBTEST. MBLOINC] If the LOINC code is available it should be used as the base code within the CD type.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode
Used to indicate whether or not an exam has been performed. [SDTM: MBSTAT]

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] value
The microbiology specimen result, using both original units and a standard format or set of units. [SDTM: MBORRES, MBORRESU, MBSTRESC, MBSTRESN, MBSTRESU]

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode
Indicates the method of the test or examination. [SDTM: MBMETHOD]

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Group Identifier (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.63)
Allows capture of a group identifier for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the specimen related test or measure is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] microbiologySpecimenFindingCategory with data type microbiology Specimen Finding Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a subcategory the specimen related test or measure is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] microbiologySpecimenFindingSubCategory with data type microbiology Specimen Finding Sub Category

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] study Test Performer
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Test Performer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)
Used to record the organization performing the test.

SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.64)
Provides a reason for not capturing information for the finding.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Specimen Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.67)
Used to capture information about the specimen used as the direct subject of the test.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Baseline Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Used to indicate whether or not a result is considered a baseline value for the study.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Derived Data Indicator (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.60)
Used to indicate whether or not a data value has derived frrom the results of other tests or inquiries.

Contains zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Indicates a category the result of the specimen related test or measure is assigned to.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] microbiologyResultCategory with data type microbiology Result Category
